**Tender Description**:

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires transportation services for Correctional Training Program (CTP) recruits. Suppliers must transport recruits from airports in Charlottetown, Moncton, or Halifax to the National Satellite Training Academy (NSTA) in Slemon Park, Summerside, Prince Edward Island. Recruits must also be transported from the NSTA to the airports and from the Atlantic, Spring Hill, and Nova Institutions.

**Submission Requirements**: Suppliers can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys / tender opportunities website. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
